articles.title: Afghanistan live news: US, UK and Australia warn citizens away from Kabul airport amid terror threat - The Guardian
articles.description: US joins UK and Australia in warning against travel to Kabul airport; 1,500 Americans remain in country with less than a week left until deadline; allies begin winding up evacuations
